value.unicode:
<tal:block define="dummy python: request.RESPONSE.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css;; charset=utf-8')"/>
 <tal:block tal:define="portal_path python:here.aq_parent.getWebSiteValue().absolute_url() + '/' + here.Localizer.get_selected_language();
 img_folder string:${portal_path}/vifib_hosting_image/;">
 
 .leftbar .box{
 width: 180px;
 }
 
 .leftbar ul {
 list-style-image:none;
 }
 
 #order_breadcrump a {
 display:block;
 text-align:center;
 text-decoration: none;
 color:#0673B8;
 }
 
 #order_breadcrump li {
 display:inline-block;
 width:90px;
 }
 
 #order_breadcrump .next a{
 color:#9C9C9C;
 }
 
 #order_breadcrump .active a{
 color:#910000;
 }
 
 .my_services {
 background:url(<tal:block tal:replace="img_folder"/>my_services_active.png) no-repeat scroll left center transparent;
 padding-left:100px;
 }
 .my_servers {
 background:url(<tal:block tal:replace="img_folder"/>my_servers_active.png) no-repeat scroll left center transparent;
 padding-left:100px;
 }
 .my_account {
 background:url(<tal:block tal:replace="img_folder"/>my_account_active.png) no-repeat scroll left center transparent;
 padding-left:100px;
 }
 .help {
 background:url(<tal:block tal:replace="img_folder"/>help_active.png) no-repeat scroll left center transparent;
 padding-left:100px;
 }
 
 #shopping_cart_renderer .listbox tr:nth-child(2n) {
 background:none repeat scroll 0 0 #FFFFFF;
 }
 
 #shopping_cart_renderer tbody tr, #shopping_cart_renderer tfoot tr {
 border-color:-moz-use-text-color -moz-use-text-color #EBEBEB;
 border-style:none none dashed;
 border-width:medium medium 1px;
 }
 
 #shopping_cart_renderer tfoot tr {
 border:medium none;
 }
 
 #shopping_cart_renderer tfoot tr td.used {
 border-bottom:1px solid #CCCCCC;
 }
 
 
 #shopping_cart_renderer td {
 font-weight: normal;
 }
 #shopping_cart_renderer tbody td, #shopping_cart_renderer tfoot td {
 height:3em;
 border-top: none;
 }
 
 .shopping-cart-renderer-title{
 font-weight:bold;
 }
 
 /* viewAsShop */
 div.no_image {
 border:1px solid #C8C8C8;
 float:left;
 height:75px;
 margin:0 10px 10px;
 text-align:center;
 width:75px;
 }
 /*Resource box in listbox*/
 .resource-summary{
 cursor:pointer;
 float:left;
 height:70px;
 padding:10px;
 width:142px;
 border:1px solid grey;
 background-color:#FFFFFF;
 }
 .resource-selected{
 background-color:#D2E7F4;
 }
 
 .service-listbox table {background-color:#FFFFFF}
 .service-listbox .listbox tr td {border-top: None;}
 .service-listbox .listbox-head {display:none;}
 .service-listbox thead {display:none;}
 .service-listbox .listbox-table-select-cell{display:none;}
 .service-listbox tr, .service-listbox td {position:relative; width:175px;float:left;background:none!important}
 </tal:block>
